Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teacher only briefs the assignment when asked, but AI gives more details to clear the doubts.

Question 41.Response: There was not much difference for most of my courses.
